casebody.data:
Leocioni, Respondent, v. Post, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. June 22, 1891.) Appeal from eleventh district court.

Argued before Allen, Bischoff, and Pryor, JJ.

L. F. Post, for appellant. F. G. Wild, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to appeal to the court of appeal, and foi ■reargument denied, with $10 costs. For opinion on appeal, see 13 N. Y. Supp. 825.
